price: 55. Kasi nini epekisaki bato bandima, tango bokambi(1) boyelaki bango, mpe basenga bolimbisi epai ya Nkolo wa bango? Sé oyo ekomelaki bankoko ba bango eyeli mpe bango, to etumbu ya lolenge nyoso eyela bango?
arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ قُبُلٗا
footnotes: 1 Bokambi: Ezali ntoma Muhammad to Kurani.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā manaʿa al-nāsa an yu'minū idh jāahumu al-hudā wayastaghfirū rabbahum illā an tatiyahum sunnatu al-awalīna aw yatiyahumu al-ʿadhābu qubulan
